title: Heavy Italic Font
content:

comments.content: That's what I thought. But when I do an overlay the weight and the "tilt" are not the same. Its not standard Arial Bold Italic. At least not my system version.
Ok. I feel stupid now. Thanks. So, Arial Black, sheared 10 degrees. I just knew I was a different font. I did not think someone would shear Arial.

If they're using Arial in the first place, they're bound to do goofy things with it.

- Lex
That is a damn good point. Those nubs.
